price: Njima je ovladao šejtan i učinio da zaborave spominjati Allaha, oni su šejtanova stranka, a zbilja, oni iz stranke šejtanove gubitnici su pravi.
arabic: ٱسۡتَحۡوَذَ عَلَيۡهِمُ ٱلشَّيۡطَٰنُ فَأَنسَىٰهُمۡ ذِكۡرَ ٱللَّهِۚ أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ حِزۡبُ ٱلشَّيۡطَٰنِۚ أَلَآ إِنَّ حِزۡبَ ٱلشَّيۡطَٰنِ هُمُ ٱلۡخَٰسِرُونَ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: is'taḥwadha ʿalayhimu al-shayṭānu fa-ansāhum dhik'ra al-lahi ulāika ḥiz'bu al-shayṭāni alā inna ḥiz'ba al-shayṭāni humu al-khāsirūna
